atk-s0517a21:2_1: Idāni samasīsakathānantaraṁ attanā vuttassa iddhipāṭihāriyassa sādhake satta anupassanāvisese dassentena kathitāya suttantapubbaṅgamāya satipaṭṭhānakathāya apubbatthānuvaṇṇanā.
atk-s0517a21:2_2: Tattha suttante tāva cattāroti gaṇanaparicchedo, tena na tato heṭṭhā,
atk-s0517a21:2_3: na uddhanti satipaṭṭhānaparicchedaṁ dīpeti. Imeti niddisitabbanidassanaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:2_6: tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatāpi, satipi. ‘‘Catunnaṁ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0517a21:2_9: Tassattho – patiṭṭhāti tasminti paṭṭhānaṁ. Kā patiṭṭhāti? Sati.
atk-s0517a21:3_2: 311) ettha tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatā ‘‘satipaṭṭhāna’’nti vuttā.
atk-s0517a21:3_3: Tassattho – paṭṭhapetabbato paṭṭhānaṁ, pavattayitabbatoti attho. Kena paṭṭhapetabbatoti? Satiyā.
atk-s0517a21:3_5: ‘‘Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrentī’’tiādīsu (ma. ni.
atk-s0517a21:3_9: Satiyeva paṭṭhānaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ. Atha vā saraṇaṭṭhena sati, upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena upaṭṭhānaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:3_10: Iti sati ca sā upaṭṭhānañcātipi satipaṭṭhānaṁ. Idamidha adhippetaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:3_11: Yadi evaṁ kasmā satipaṭṭhānāti bahuvacanaṁ katanti? Satibahuttā.
atk-s0517a21:4_0: Katame cattāroti kathetukamyatāpucchā. Idhāti imasmiṁ sāsane.
atk-s0517a21:4_2: Sesapadānaṁ atthavaṇṇanā panettha sutamayañāṇakathāya maggasaccaniddesavaṇṇanāyaṁ vuttāyevāti.
atk-s0517a21:5_0: Kasmā pana bhagavatā cattārova satipaṭṭhānā vuttā anūnā anadhikāti? Veneyyahitattā.
atk-s0517a21:5_1: Taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritasamathayānikavipassanāyānikesu hi mandatikkhavasena dvedhā dvedhā pavattesu mandassa taṇhācaritassa oḷārikaṁ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṁ visuddhimaggo,
atk-s0517a21:5_5: Samathayānikassa ca mandassa akicchena adhigantabbanimittaṁ paṭhamaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ visuddhimaggo,
atk-s0517a21:6_2: Tesaṁ tattha asubhabhāvadassanena tassa vipallāsassa pahānatthaṁ paṭhamaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:6_3: Sukhaṁ niccaṁ attāti gahitesupi ca vedanādīsu vedanā dukkhā, cittaṁ aniccaṁ, dhammā anattā,
atk-s0517a21:6_5: Tesaṁ tattha dukkhādibhāvadassanena tesaṁ vipallāsānaṁ pahānatthaṁ sesāni tīṇi vuttānīti evaṁ subhasukhaniccaattavipallāsappahānatthaṁ vā cattārova vuttā.
atk-s0517a21:7_2: Sakalasarīre pana pathavīdhātūnaṁ bahukattā sabbapathavīdhātusaṅgahatthaṁ samūhatthena kāyaggahaṇaṁ kataṁ. Āpokāyādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0517a21:7_4: Vakkādīni pana paricchinnattā kāyaggahaṇaṁ nārahantīti tesaṁ gahaṇaṁ na katanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:8_0: (Kha) sukhaṁvedanantiādīsu sukhaṁ vedananti kāyikaṁ vā cetasikaṁ vā sukhaṁ vedanaṁ. Tathā dukkhaṁ vedanaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:10_0: (Gha) tadavasese dhammeti tehi kāyavedanācittehi avasese tebhūmakadhamme.
atk-s0517a21:10_1: Sabbattha tena ñāṇenāti tena sattavidhena anupassanāñāṇena.
